name: The Consistent Bridge
description:
A variation of Free Bridge that plays the same hand every time for Mini Jam 95 - a game of chance without the chance! Massively reduced the planned scope and still had trouble meeting the deadline. It is possible to achieve a Grand Slam in the hand played. Expect updates eventually. 😁

Big shout out to William Hodges for the cover picture. Less of a shout out to the Safari developers whose browser crashes on this.
